title: New: Trim – Bandoolou
content:
Now I don’t know about you, but it’s been a long time since I sat through a grime record from start to finish.

In fact, the last time I achieved this was probably after Trim dropped his debut Mixtape. Long story short, Trim has an effect on me.

He does everything right, great beats, sharp flows and just the right amount of abstract tendencies. The tape is made up of 10 tracks, 2 of which are actually freestyles, but frankly if it wasn’t in the tracks’ infro, you’d be hard pushed to notice. Grab the full tape here, and hit play below for a taste of the tape.

Tracklisting:
1. Intro (Prod. Harmonic 313)
2. No For an Answer (Prod. Rude Kid)
3. Hate Me Feat. Obese, Nico Lindsay & Careless (Prod. Shotz)
4. Dat (Prod. Teddy)
5. Trim & Nico Lindsay Freestyle
6. Lord of Lords Feat. Riko (Prod. Harmonic 313)
7. War Mode Feat. Scorcher
8. Bandoolou Feat. Obese, Nico Lindsay & Careless (Prod. Shotz)
9. Motto Freestyle
10. Bar So Hard (Prod. Balistiq)
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
